trans-unit.source: Defines a workflow communication activity that is used to call a method on a local service.
trans-unit.target: Define uma atividade de comunicação do fluxo de trabalho que é usada para chamar um método em um serviço local.

trans-unit.source: This activity is used to send data from the workflow to the host through the local service.
trans-unit.target: Esta atividade é usada para enviar dados do fluxo de trabalho para o host por meio do serviço local.

trans-unit.source: A local service is a class that implements a local service interface (an interface that is marked with <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>) and is added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço local é uma classe que implementa uma interface de serviço local (uma interface marcada com <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>) e é adicionado para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>.

trans-unit.source: When the external method is called all parameters of the method are cloned.
trans-unit.target: Quando o método externo é chamado de todos os parâmetros do método são clonados.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter types implement <xref:System.ICloneable> the `Clone` method is called or they are serialized and deserialized with a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: Se os tipos de parâmetro implementam <xref:System.ICloneable> o `Clone` método é chamado ou se eles são serializados e desserializados com um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> in a custom activity to call an external method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> em uma atividade personalizada para chamar um método externo.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Listen SDK sample from the PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs escutar SDK.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of the `CallExternalMethodActivity` class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar uma instância do `CallExternalMethodActivity` classe.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é um exemplo PersistenceHost SDK, do arquivo DocumentApprovalWorkflow.designer.cs de.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Persistence Host Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ba72a8f-eb95-410f-bb00-180f3c35f251).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Exemplo de Host de persistência](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ba72a8f-eb95-410f-bb00-180f3c35f251).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como inicializa uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The code also initializes new instances of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> classes.
trans-unit.target: O código também inicia novas instâncias de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> classes.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Listen SDK sample from the PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs escutar SDK.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Listen Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Exemplo de escutar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f).

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity, used to initialize the activity name property.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo usuário da atividade, usado para inicializar a propriedade de nome de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> for the external method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> para o método externo.

trans-unit.source: The correlation token for the external method.
trans-unit.target: O token de correlação para o método externo.

trans-unit.source: This property defines which specific <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> activity a given external method call comes from.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade define qual específico <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> atividade proveniente de uma chamada de método externo fornecido.

trans-unit.source: This value can then be used in the payload of a local communication service event to direct that event to the correct <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor, em seguida, pode ser usado na carga do evento de comunicação local do serviço para direcionar o evento para o correto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> atividade.

trans-unit.source: For an example of correlation, see the [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de correlação, consulte o [correlacionado exemplo de serviço Local](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).

trans-unit.source: The following sample shows how to access the `CorrelationToken` property of a `CallExternalMethodActivity` object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como acessar o `CorrelationToken` propriedade de um `CallExternalMethodActivity` objeto.

trans-unit.source: This sample is from the Correlated Local Service SDK sample, from the CorrelatedLocalServiceWorkflow.designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é um exemplo correlacionados SDK do serviço Local, do arquivo CorrelatedLocalServiceWorkflow.designer.cs de.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Correlacionado exemplo de serviço Local](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que tem como destino a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> that contains the execution environment in which to run the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> que contém o ambiente de execução no qual o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity" /> é executado.

trans-unit.source: Tries to run the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Tenta executar o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="executionContext" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="executionContext" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The service object for the <paramref name="executionContext" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O objeto de serviço para o <paramref name="executionContext" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs initialization on dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: Executa a inicialização nas propriedades de dependência.

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken%2A> property, verifies the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> properties are set and verifies that the event referenced in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> property can be found in the interface referenced in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esse método inicializa o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken%2A> propriedade, verifica o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> propriedades são definidas e verifica se o evento citados no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> pode ser encontrada na interface referenciada no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an external method's declaring interface that has the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um método externo que declara a interface que tem o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: The external method's declaring interface that has the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: O método externo da declaração de interface que tem o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The interface type must be attributed with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de interface deve ser atribuído com o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Listen SDK sample from the PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs escutar SDK.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Listen Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Exemplo de escutar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que tem como destino a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> property corresponds to the name of the interface that was marked with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> propriedade corresponde ao nome da interface que foi marcado com o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before invoking the method.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes da chamada do método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking> event to set the method to call before invoking the external method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking> evento para definir o método a ser chamado antes de chamar o método externo.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Listen SDK sample from the PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs escutar SDK.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Listen Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Exemplo de escutar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que destina-se ao evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking> event defines an event delegate that is executed before the activity invokes the external method on the local service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking> evento define um delegado de evento que é executado antes que a atividade invoca o método externo no serviço local.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to be called on the local service registered with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do método a ser chamado no serviço local registrado com o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService" />.

trans-unit.source: The method name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: O nome do método do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService" /> interface.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> property to set the method name of the external method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> propriedade para definir o nome do método do método externo.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Listen SDK sample from the PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo PurchaseOrderWorkflow.Designer.cs escutar SDK.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Listen Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Exemplo de escutar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1cec0e82-7544-429f-b717-0fc25eb42b7f).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que tem como destino a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> property corresponds to the name of a method contained on an interface that is marked with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> propriedade corresponde ao nome de um método contido em uma interface marcada com o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the data for the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides a hook for derived classes to extract out and return values from the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um gancho para classes derivadas extraírem e retornarem valores do <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called just after the external method is run.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado logo após a execução do método externo.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an implementation of the `OnMethodInvoked` method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra uma implementação do `OnMethodInvoked` método.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the data for the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides a hook for derived classes to set <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um gancho para classes derivadas definirem <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called just before the external method is run.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado logo antes da execução do método externo.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates an implementation of the `OnMethodInvoking` method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra uma implementação de `OnMethodInvoking` método.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é do exemplo de correlacionados SDK do serviço Local do arquivo CreateTask.cs.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of bindable parameters as found in the external method's formal parameter list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de parâmetros associáveis como encontrados na lista de parâmetros formais do método externo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection" /> of parameters to bind to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection" /> de parâmetros para associar a.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a parameter binding to the parameter bindings collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como adicionar uma associação de parâmetro na coleção de associações de parâmetro.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é da amostra do SDK de comunicação de Host, do arquivo VotingServiceWorkflow.designer.cs.

trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Exemplo de comunicação de host](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ce4b0b8c-bfa3-4c24-b85a-5835a440ea8f).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que tem como destino a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> para fornecer acesso aos serviços de tempo de design se eles forem necessários.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the access type for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o tipo de acesso para a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes" /> enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes" /> que indica o nível de acesso da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
trans-unit.target: Usado em tempo de compilação para validar se as propriedades associadas corretamente um ao outro.

trans-unit.source: Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
trans-unit.target: Sem essa interface essas informações são inferidas diretamente do getter/setters de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> para fornecer acesso aos serviços de tempo de design se eles forem necessários.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do da propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the property whose name is passed as the <paramref name="propertyName" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> para a propriedade cujo nome é passado como o parâmetro <paramref name="propertyName" />.

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other.
trans-unit.target: Usado em tempo de compilação para validar se as propriedades corretamente estão associadas a um do outro.
